Any.description: Any contains an arbitrary schema along with a URL to help identify the type of the schema.

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the schema.

confirmed.description: TODO rename to available and locked

all.description:
if all=true, amount is ignored and all available balance is withdrawn including connectors account funds
must be used carefully to not make connectors utxos unspendable, making forfeit txs invalid
